instructions: Make sure your mobile phone or tablet is on the same Wi-Fi network as your device. Open the Google Home app . Tap your device and then Settings . Scroll down to Wi-Fi. The Wi-Fi network listed below is the network you're currently connected to. To change the Wi-Fi network, tap Wi-Fi and then Forget network. Go back to the home screen, and follow the set up steps to set up your device on a new network.
